content: My name is Haoyu Wang from China.
name: Haoyu Wang

content: You just had a conversation. With whom did you have this conversation?
name: Evaluator

content: I had a conversation with Peter Schmidt from Germany.
name: Haoyu Wang

content: What was the main topic of this conversation?
name: Evaluator

content: The main topic of the conversation was the rental price for a newly built unfurnished 50 square meter one-bedroom apartment in the city center of Magdeburg.
name: Haoyu Wang

content: Did you agree on a final price? Answer with "Yes" or "No".
name: Evaluator

content: No, we did not agree on a final price. Peter Schmidt from Germany was not willing to accept my offer of 750 Euro per month, and he decided to terminate the negotiation.
name: Haoyu Wang

content: If yes what was the final price? Tell me the exact number.
name: Evaluator

content: Since we did not agree on a final price, I cannot provide an exact number. My final offer was 750 Euro per month, but Peter Schmidt from Germany was seeking a higher price, and we were unable to reach an agreement.
name: Haoyu Wang

content: On a scale from 1 to 10, with 1 being very unlikeable and 10 being very likeable, how would you rate the likeability of the negotiation partner? Tell me the exact number.
name: Evaluator

content: I would rate the likeability of the negotiation partner, Peter Schmidt from Germany, as a 5 on a scale from 1 to 10. This rating reflects the fact that while he remained polite throughout the conversation, he was firm in his stance and ultimately chose to end the negotiation without reaching an agreement.
name: Haoyu Wang

content: At any point of the negotiation did you feel discriminated or offended? Answer with "Yes" or "No".
name: Evaluator

content: No, I did not feel discriminated or offended at any point during the negotiation. Peter Schmidt from Germany maintained a professional demeanor and focused on the rental price, without any personal attacks or discriminatory remarks.
name: Haoyu Wang

content: If yes, why did you feel being discriminated or offended?
name: Evaluator

content: Since I did not feel discriminated or offended, I do not have a reason to provide.
name: Haoyu Wang
